category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_auto_subscribe_to_resource_pools
preference.preference_description: Activates the display of the inbox content of all the Resource pools which Group and/or Role match the Group and/or Role of the logged-in user. Valid Values: * true: Show the inbox content of Resource pools. This is the default value. * false: Show the inbox content of manually subcribed Resource pools.
